experience.title: experience
experience.description:
🟤 Jack Runners Roastery
Digital Marketer · SEO Specialist · Web Developer · Designer · Video Editor
📍 2024 – 2025
Built and managed the digital presence for Jack Runners Roastery, a specialty coffee brand.

Developed and maintained the website using modern web technologies with a focus on speed and responsiveness.

Created SEO-focused content and optimized structure for better search visibility.

Designed marketing visuals, packaging layouts, and social media creatives to strengthen brand identity.

Produced engaging short-form video content for campaigns and product launches.

Collaborated with marketing team to align digital strategies with brand goals.

🟣 IndoFitness Family (rickydarmawan.com)
Digital Marketer · SEO Specialist · Web Developer · Graphic Designer · Video Editor · IT Support
📍 2024 – 2024
Led the end-to-end digital efforts for an online coaching and fitness brand.

Developed and maintained the website using Kajabi, integrating blogs, programs, and forms.

Managed SEO initiatives including metadata, keyword structure, and blog optimization.

Designed promotional materials for fitness challenges, guides, and coaching programs.

Edited educational YouTube videos, reels, and ads to drive audience engagement.

Provided technical support for hosting, domain, and email integrations.

🟡 Surya Sakti ARS (suryasaktiars.com)
IT Support · Web Developer · SEO Specialist · Digital Marketer · Video Editor · Graphic Designer
📍 2021 – 2022
Contributed to the company’s online transformation through multi-disciplinary roles.

Managed website structure and performance to align with corporate needs.

Applied SEO practices to improve visibility and lead generation.

Supported technical infrastructure including networking, devices, and server maintenance.

Produced and edited video campaigns for product education and brand awareness.

Created design assets for brochures, catalogs, and online advertisements.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
⚛️ Frontend Development:
Next.js, React.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, HTML5, CSS3

🧑‍💻 Backend & API:
Node.js, Express.js, RESTful APIs, Firebase, Supabase

🗂️ Database:
MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQLite, Prisma

🧠 Machine Learning & AI:
TensorFlow.js, neural network agents, Electron.js integration

🔐 Cybersecurity:
AES encryption, Argon2 hashing, secure authentication systems

📈 SEO & Digital Marketing:
On-page SEO, keyword strategy, Google Search Console, analytics tracking

🎨 Design & UI/UX:
Figma, Canva, responsive design, design systems

🎬 Video Editing:
CapCut, Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve

⚙️ Tools & Productivity:
Git, GitHub, VSCode, Notion, Linux CLI, Vercel, Netlify, Postman

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
🧩 Problem Solving
Strong logical thinking, system design, and optimization mindset

🧠 Analytical Thinking
Ability to break down complex problems and find data-driven solutions

🎯 Focus & Discipline
Sharp attention to detail, especially in coding and sports like tennis/golf

💬 Communication
Clear and empathetic communicator, both technical and non-technical

👨‍👩‍👧 Empathy & Leadership
Family-oriented mindset that translates into care, patience, and collaboration

🔄 Adaptability
Always open to learning new tools, frameworks, and workflows

⌛ Time Management
Balancing work, creativity, family, and growth with consistency

🎨 Creativity
Strong sense of design, aesthetics, and content storytelling

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
🔹 Nur Muchson Rahwanda Seto
👨‍💻 Full-stack Web Developer | 🎨 Designer & 🎬 Video Editor
📈 SEO Specialist | 📣 Digital Marketer | 🔐 Cybersecurity Enthusiast
🤖 AI & Neural Network Hobbyist | 🧠 Tech Craftsman

📍 Based in Indonesia, I blend technology, visual creativity, and strategy to build impactful digital solutions—ranging from dynamic web platforms and content-driven SEO to clean UI design and intelligent neural network systems.

💡 My core capabilities include:

⚛️ Frontend & Backend: Next.js, React, Node.js
🧠 Machine Learning: TensorFlow, Electron-based agents
🎨 UI/UX Design: Figma, Canva, design systems
🎬 Video Editing: CapCut, Premiere, DaVinci Resolve
🗂️ Database: SQL & NoSQL
🔒 Security: AES, Argon2, encrypted storage

👨‍👩‍👧 Proud family man passionate about:

🌱 Gardening & learning with my daughter
🛵 Motor touring with my wife
🧳 Family long-trips & memory-making
📚 Reading together
🎾 Tennis, 🏊 Swimming, 🏌️‍♂️ Golf for focus & agility

🚀 I design, build, and secure experiences—from code to content, from interface to infrastructure.

🔗 Let's collaborate on something inspiring, secure, and beautiful.

interests.title: interests
interests.description:
🌱 Family Moments
Learning and growing with my daughter, planting grapes, collecting flowers, and touring on motorbikes with my wife. I'm deeply driven by the joy of being a family man.

🧠 Technology & Software Development
Passionate about full-stack development, JavaScript ecosystems, Next.js, React, and building intelligent systems through AI and neural networks.

🧑‍🎨 Design & Creative Work
Designing interfaces with clarity and empathy using Figma, and crafting compelling visual stories through video editing.

🔐 Cybersecurity & Digital Ethics
Exploring encryption, secure authentication, and privacy-first development—building tech that protects users, not exploits them.

📈 Digital Marketing & SEO
Helping brands grow online through organic strategies, content planning, and performance-focused marketing campaigns.

⚙️ Tinkering & Problem Solving
Automating tasks, optimizing performance, building agents that learn—curiosity drives my love for experimentation.

🏸 Focus-based Sports
Tennis, swimming, and golf fuel my need for precision, agility, and mental clarity. I believe sport sharpens not just the body, but also decision-making.

📚 Reading & Personal Growth
I enjoy reading books with my daughter, discussing ideas with family, and staying updated with tech, design, and human behavior.

education.title: education
education.description: My educational journey began with a strong foundation through elementary to high school, and continued with a degree in Informatics Engineering from Universitas Terbuka. This flexible and technology-driven learning environment sharpened my skills in programming, system analysis, and digital problem-solving—forming the core of my work in web development, SEO, and digital strategy.

sports.title: sports
sports.description:
I'm passionate about sports that require focus, agility, and precision. My favorites include:

🎾 Tennis – A perfect blend of strategy and speed.
🏊‍♂️ Swimming – For focus, breathing control, and mental clarity.
⛳ Golf – Teaching patience, accuracy, and mindset discipline.

These activities help me recharge, stay sharp, and maintain the same level of focus and adaptability I bring into my work as a developer and digital creator.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description:
In my free time, I enjoy playing games that stimulate strategic thinking, reaction speed, and problem solving—reflecting my interests in both logic and creativity. Some of my favorite types of games include:

🧠 Puzzle and Logic Games – Like Portal, The Talos Principle, or Monument Valley
🚗 Racing and Touring Games – Like Gran Turismo or MotoGP, connecting my love of riding with gaming
🤖 Simulation & AI Strategy Games – Including Factorio, Civilization, or AI-based simulations that inspire my neural network projects

For me, games are more than entertainment—they're an extension of how I learn, explore, and improve focus, all while having fun with my family or during downtime.
